title: 如果你在单人里发现一群him会怎么样
author: 幻影随冥
txt_content: 一群 注意是一群！不是一个两个而是一群！

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: /gamemode 1{:10_492:}

replies.author: 3355o
replies.txt_content:
嗯……我想想
/gamemode 1
/gamemode 3
/kill
/weather thunder 100000（然后睡觉）
和平开起来......

replies.author: 板鱼殿
replies.txt_content:
/give <板鱼殿> 137
然后开服，，哈哈哈我就是腐竹，你们这群渣HIM接受我的审判吧！以最快下完腐竹剑MOD，一刀9999，全挂

replies.author: GKF
replies.txt_content: Alt+F4 然后睡觉

replies.author: 葫芦葫芦瓢
replies.txt_content: 我会说：不可能

replies.author: unwindy
replies.txt_content: 抓起来，关在一起，另外him吃什么，能繁殖出小him吗？

replies.author: 524399hjn
replies.txt_content:
删档
{ps:如果是重要的就开和平}

replies.author: 我的心声
replies.txt_content: 我会/gm 1然后拿出最终剑杀了他们

replies.author: 周好
replies.txt_content: 立刻叫来所有朋友，决一死战的时候到了...

replies.author: Keterbrine_
replies.txt_content: 不要怂就是干！虽然干不过233

replies.author: 我滴世界.
replies.txt_content: 把他们围起来！！然后拿钻石剑一个一个砍死！！！

replies.author: ricky31415
replies.txt_content: 合影留念

replies.author: sjx
replies.txt_content: /kill @e[name=Herobrine]复制代码
回复 板鱼殿：kill不行吗

replies.txt_content:
